title: Can You Record or Videotape Your Spouse without ... - Ashby Law
description: May 17, 2016   First, a person can be recorded without their consent during emergency situations, as in recorded calls to 9-1-1. Second, a person can record anonymous or repeated harassing phone calls even if he or she is unsure of who is behind the calls. Finally, a person can secretly record threats of bodily harm, extortion, or blackmail.

title: If you can secretly record a President, can you secretly ...
description: Aug 19, 2019   That secret recording you made of your spouse screaming like a lunatic is actually illegal and could get you in hot water.
